name: @jupiterone/integration-sdk-entities
description: Generated types for the JupiterOne data-model
author: JupiterOne <dev@jupiterone.io>

scripts.generate-ts-classes: yarn run copy-schemas && rm -rf src && mkdir src && json2ts -i 'tools/copy-schemas/_schemas/*.json' -o src  --cwd=tools/copy-schemas/_schemas --declareExternallyReferenced=false && ts-dedupe --duplicatesFile=src/Base.ts && yarn run create-barrel
